# Warlincourt-lès-Pas

|term               = 2020–2026
|intercommunality   = Campagnes de l'Artois

Warlincourt-lès-Pas (, literally Warlincourt near Pas) is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region of France about  southwest of Arras.
History
The commune was awarded the Croix de Guerre on 23 September 1920.
Population

*Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department
